Method Detail

getScores

public java.util.ArrayList<LeaderBoardEntry> getScores(int modeFlag,
                                                       int difficultyFlag)
A method that generates an array list of scores from a text file that stores all of the high scores. It reads from a different text file depending on the game mode and difficulty

Parameters:
modeFlag - is the integer indicating the game mode
difficultyFlag - is the integer indicating the game difficulty
Returns:
An array list of scores

setNewScore

public void setNewScore(int modeFlag,
                        int difficultyFlag,
                        java.lang.String newName,
                        int newScore)
A method that stores a new high score into the high score board. It first determines if the new score is a high score or not, and if it is then its location in the score board is found and another function is called to store it.

Parameters:
modeFlag - is an integer indicating the game mode
difficultyFlag - is an integer indicating the game difficulty
newName - is the name of the new high score
newScore - is the score number of the new high score

storeLeaderBoard

private void storeLeaderBoard(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderBoardEntry> scoreArray,
                              int modeFlag,
                              int difficultyFlag)
A method that stores an array of leader board entries to a text file

Parameters:
scoreArray - is the array of leader board entries to be stored
modeFlag - is the integer indicating the game mode
difficultyFlag - is the integer indicating the game difficulty

getFileInputStream

private java.io.FileInputStream getFileInputStream(int modeFlag,
                                                   int difficultyFlag)
A method that determines and returns what file needs to be read for input

Parameters:
modeFlag - is an integer that indicates the game mode
difficultyFlag - is an integer that indicates the game difficulty
Returns:
a file input stream to be used to read input

getFile

private java.io.File getFile(int modeFlag,
                             int difficultyFlag)
A method that determines and returns what file needs to written to for output

Parameters:
modeFlag - is an integer that indicates the game mode
difficultyFlag - is an integer that indicates the game difficulty
Returns:
a file to write output to
